citations.narrative:
The enclosure housing two African Crested Porcupines has sharp wires protruding into the enclosure where the ACPs
have been engaging in their normal digging activity. The exposed sharp wires pose a paw entrapment risk or a puncture
injury risk to the ACPs. The regulations state that the facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as
appropriate for the animals involved. The indoor and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be
maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. Corrected during inspection.

The waterers for the two groups of degu contained excessive amounts of green algae. Not providing clean, potable water
can result in dehydration or illness risk due to reduced water consumption or from drinking potentially contaminated water.
The regulations state that all water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary. Corrected during inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The enclosure housing two African Crested Porcupines has sharp wires protruding into the enclosure where the ACPs 
have been engaging in their normal digging activity. The exposed sharp wires pose a paw entrapment risk or a puncture 
injury risk to the ACPs. The regulations state that the facility must be constructed of such material and of such strength as 
appropriate for the animals involved. The indoor and outdoor housing facilities shall be structurally sound and shall be 
maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. Corrected during inspection. 
3.130 
   
Watering. 
The waterers for the two groups of degu contained excessive amounts of green algae. Not providing clean, potable water 
can result in dehydration or illness risk due to reduced water consumption or from drinking potentially contaminated water. 
The regulations state that all water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary. Corrected during inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
